alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Putnam; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 8:43PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central De Kalb, northwestern White and western Putnam Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 842 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Smithville, Baxter, Dowelltown, Center Hill Lake, Hamptons Crossroads, Bakers Crossroads, Burgess Falls State Park and Edgar Evans State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 270 and 288. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee.
